original_title: Papaji and the Buddha: A Talk by David Godman
overview: This is a talk I gave outside my Tiruvannamalai home in February 2019. I look a little gaunt and thin because a few days before I had been discharged from hospital after having a total knee replacement. I apparently now look much better.  The texts that I read from can be obtained from the Avadhuta Foundation in Boulder, CO, USA.
title: Papaji and the Buddha: A Talk by David Godman
